        public static void setReadOnlyMode()

        public static void setReadWriteMode()
        Invoke this method to set the server state as read/write All servercheck requests will be responsded with 200 henceforth

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to initialize a http, a internal and a set of ssl ports mentioned in awsadapterconf.properties and sslservers.properties
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.util.Hashtable portconf)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to initialize a http, a internal and a set of ssl ports
        Parameters:
        portconf - - A Hashtable with details of webserver.port,webserver.sslservers (key of hastable) Note: 1.Multiple ssl ports can be initialized. 2.The value of webserver.sslservers should of type Properties whose key and values should be represented in form servername=port,domain,sslstartuptype. Ex: zoho=8080,*.zoho.com,1 sslstartuptype -- 0 - default, 1 - offloader , 2 - none
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setLBSSLIP

        public static void setLBSSLIP(java.lang.String ips)
        This method is used to set Load Balancer ssl ip ranges ips- list of ssl ips seperated by comma

        public static void startPort(java.util.Hashtable portconf)

        To start new ports in addition to the already running ones

Ex: zoho=8080,*.zoho.com,1 sslstartuptype -- 0 - default, 1 - offloader , 2 - none

      • stopPort

        public static void stopPort(java.util.Hashtable portconf)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        To stop the current ports
        Parameters:
        portconf - - A Hashtable with details of webserver.port,webserver.sslservers (key of hastable) Note: 1.Multiple ssl ports can be stopped 2.The value of webserver.sslservers should of type Properties whose key and values should be represented in form servername=port,domain,sslstartuptype. Ex: zoho=8080,*.zoho.com,1 sslstartuptype -- 0 - default, 1 - offloader , 2 - none
        Throws:

      • updateThreadPoolExecutorConfs

        public static boolean updateThreadPoolExecutorConfs(java.lang.String threadPoolName,
                                                    int corePoolSize,
                                                    int maxPoolSize,
                                                    long keepaliveTime,
                                                    int maxThreadCreationLimit)
        To Set ThreadPoolExecutor's pool size and keepalive time at runtime based on demand.
        Parameters:
        threadPoolName - To indicate the poolName. Pass one of the below values as ThreadPoolName. AWSConstants.REQUEST_PROCESSOR - For modifying requestProcessor thread counts AWSConstants.REQUEST_PROCESSOR_WS - For modifying Websocket Write ACK thread counts AWSConstants.NETDATA_PROCESSOR - For modifying netdataProcessor thread counts AWSConstants.ASYNCLOG_PROCESSOR - For modifying AsyncLogProcessor thread counts AWSConstants.WEBENGINE+engine name - For update webengine pool size
        corePoolSize - Sets the core number of threads.
        maxPoolSize - Sets the maximum allowed number of threads.
        keepaliveTime - Sets the time limit for which threads may remain idle before being terminated.
        maxThreadCreationLimit - Sets the threshold limit to create the maxPool threads once the queue reach this limit (only for WMSThreadPool, otherwise zero)
        Returns:
        update status - true/false

        To clear the cache of default servlet of all engines.
